languages.text: {n}Прежде, чем Иокаста успевает ответить, офицер Хротко берет слово:{/n} "Ваша Светлость, среди черни, ждущей допроса, был некий Гведон. Он мне сразу показался подозрительным. Позвольте провести дознание при вас!"

{n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"
languages.original_text: {n}Прежде, чем Иокаста успевает ответить, офицер Хротко берет слово:{/n} "Ваша Светлость, среди черни, ждущей допроса, был некий Гведон. Он мне сразу показался подозрительным. Позвольте провести дознание при вас!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

{n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in,{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

{n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

{n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

{n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

{n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

languages.text: {n}Hrotko intervient avant que Sauerback puisse répondre :{/n} « Il y avait un certain Gwedon parmi les va-nu-pieds qui attendaient d'être interrogés, Votre Seigneurie. Il m'a tout de suite paru suspect. Avec votre permission, j'aimerais l'interroger en votre auguste présence ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hrotko intervient avant que Sauerback puisse répondre :{/n} « Il y avait un certain Gwedon parmi les va-nu-pieds qui attendaient d'être interrogés, Votre Seigneurie. Il m'a tout de suite paru suspect. Avec votre permission, j'aimerais l'interroger en votre auguste présence ! »

languages.text: {n}Antes de que Sauerback pueda responder, Hrotko intercede:{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, había un hombre llamado Gwedon entre los plebeyos a la espera de interrogatorio. Me resultó sospechoso al momento. ¡Por favor, permita que le interrogue en su presencia!».
languages.original_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que Sauerback pueda responder, Hrotko intercede:{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, había un hombre llamado Gwedon entre los plebeyos a la espera de interrogatorio. Me resultó sospechoso al momento. ¡Por favor, permita que le interrogue en su presencia!».

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克还没来得及回答，赫洛卡就插话了。{/n}“大人，工人之中有个人叫戈登，目前正在等候审讯。这个人让我觉得非常可疑，请允许我当着您的面审讯这个人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克还没来得及回答，赫洛卡就插话了。{/n}“大人，工人之中有个人叫戈登，目前正在等候审讯。这个人让我觉得非常可疑，请允许我当着您的面审讯这个人！”

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックが答える前に、フロトコが割り込んだ。{/n}「陛下、グウェンドンという男が取り調べをを待っていた群衆の中にいました。彼はどう見ても怪しい。どうか、あなたの面前でその男を尋問させてください！」
languages.original_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックが答える前に、フロトコが割り込んだ。{/n}「陛下、グウェンドンという男が取り調べをを待っていた群衆の中にいました。彼はどう見ても怪しい。どうか、あなたの面前でその男を尋問させてください！」

languages.text: {n}Ehe Sauerback antworten kann, unterbricht Hrotko:{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unter dem Pöbel, der darauf wartete, verhört zu werden, befand sich ein Mann namens Gwedon. Er kam mir sofort verdächtig vor. Bitte gestattet mir, den Mann in Eurem Beisein zu verhören!"
languages.original_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ehe Sauerback antworten kann, unterbricht Hrotko:{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unter dem Pöbel, der darauf wartete, verhört zu werden, befand sich ein Mann namens Gwedon. Er kam mir sofort verdächtig vor. Bitte gestattet mir, den Mann in Eurem Beisein zu verhören!"

languages.text: {n}Sauerback cevap veremeden Hrotko araya giriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, ayaktakımını arasında Gwedon adında sorgulanmayı bekleyen bir adam vardı. Gözüme anında şüpheli geldi. Lütfen adamı huzurunuzda sorguya çekmeme müsaade edin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Before Sauerback can respond, Hrotko cuts in:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there was a man named Gwedon among the rabble waiting to be interrogated. He immediately struck me as suspicious. Please allow me to question the man in your presence!"
